titles.title: Naught have I gotten but what I received

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
c1
verse.lines: Only a sinner saved by grace! Only a sinner saved by grace! This is my story, to God be the glory, I’m only a sinner saved by grace!

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: Suffer a sinner whose heart overflows, Loving his Savior to tell what he knows; Once more to tell it, would I embrace— I’m only a sinner saved by grace!
